content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn to talk about a past holiday with a colleague using a past tense called 'passato prossimo'.
To talk about where you have been, use the verb 'essere' (to be) in the past. A man says 'Sono stato' and a woman says 'Sono stata'.

data.tip: The 's' is soft, like in 'snake', followed by 'tato' or 'tata'.

content.title: Starting the conversation
content.setting: Your colleague, Marco, sees you at the office after your holiday and starts a conversation.

conversation_flow.title: Say where you went on holiday
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ciao! Bentornato/a. Dove sei stato/a in vacanza?

extract_info.holiday_location: Extract the location the user mentions, e.g., Spagna, mare.

conversation_flow.title: Mention who you went with
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Bello! In {holiday_location}! E con chi eri?

conversation_flow.title: State how long you were there
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Capisco. E per quanto tempo sei stato/a lì?

content.text: To describe things in the past, like the weather, we often use a tense called 'imperfetto'. For now, just learn these useful phrases.
To talk about actions you did with others ('we'), many verbs use 'abbiamo' + a past participle.

content.title: Describing the holiday
content.setting: Marco is interested and asks for more details about your trip.

conversation_flow.title: Say what the weather was like
Mention an activity you did
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfetto. E cosa avete fatto di interessante?

conversation_flow.title: Describe the food
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Suona bene. E il cibo? Era buono?

content.text: To give your overall opinion, you can use the phrase 'È stata una vacanza...' which means 'It was a... holiday'.
To say you would like to do something, use 'Vorrei'.

data.meaning: I would like to go back

content.text: Now it's your turn to ask your colleague about their plans.

data.phrase: E tu? Hai programmi per le vacanze?
data.meaning: And you? Do you have plans for the holidays?

data.tip: Remember to roll the 'r' and stress the 'gram' syllable.

content.title: Wrapping up
content.setting: You are about to finish the conversation with Marco.

conversation_flow.title: Give your overall opinion
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Bene! Allora, in generale, è stata una bella vacanza?

conversation_flow.title: Say you would like to go back
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Fantastico! Sono contento per te. Vorresti tornare?

conversation_flow.title: Ask about their holiday plans
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: È una buona idea. Grazie per avermi raccontato.
